items.sentence: Tom walked over the broken glass barefooted.
I've sprained my ankle and it hurts to walk.
Prepare for the worst and hope for the best.
I did that once in a while when I was a kid.
Do you think Boston is a safe place to live?
It's not good for you to eat too much candy.
I knew you'd been keeping something from me.
I began learning French when I was thirteen.
How long has Tom been there talking to Mary?
Tom says that Mary didn't seem to be sleepy.
Since I have a cold, I can't taste anything.
Tom went somewhere and has just gotten back.
Tom believes that nobody will find him here.
Why haven't you done what you said you'd do?
Real friendship is more valuable than money.
My sister is constantly reading comic books.
Tom isn't in his room. I wonder where he is.
Tom got caught up in the heat of the moment.
Does it look like the plane will be crowded?
Tom made a clean breast of the whole matter.
